span.span: Releases all resources used by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是簡單呼叫。This method is a simple call to . 呼叫`Dispose`允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關`Dispose`，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以釋放目前的轉換所使用的資源。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to release the resources used by the current transform. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform/CPP/members.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform/CS/members.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform/VB/members.vb#7)]

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: Resets the internal state of so that it can be used again to do a different encryption or decryption.

span.span: Resets the internal state of so that it can be used again to do a different encryption or decryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 TransformFinalBlock 時自動呼叫方法。The method is called automatically when you call TransformFinalBlock. `Reset`時，例如，加密輸入的資料是記憶體回收，而無法解密，不會呼叫方法。The `Reset` method is not called when, for example, the encrypted input data is garbage and cannot be decrypted. 在此情況下，會擲回例外狀況和`Reset`則不會呼叫。In this case, an exception is thrown and `Reset` is not called. 您可以選擇手動呼叫`Reset`方法在此情況下。You can choose to manually call the `Reset` method in this case.
